name: Edward, Lianne & Edward II
message: Oh, our stay was quite splendid indeed as expected with such a cute sounding name for a tiny hotel in the middle of the Austrian Alps

name: Eddy Jr
message: Kept losing my parents, which was a good thing but they kept getting angry at me for no reason, would not recommend

name: Lisa
message: Omg I could stay here forever like the energy here was like so amazing. I could like totes like feel the positive vibes like ugh sooo wanna go back already...
